title: my big birthday party!!
content:
it was keen themed, it was huge, it took 29hrs. and 53.sec,
and it was,

MY BIRTHDAY PARTY!!

whe built a fort 20.ft by 30.ft in the living room,
keen on the cake, on the walls and on tv
[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-drool.gif[/img] we played keen music on max volume [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-drool.gif[/img]
(along with who let the dogs out,)

it was a huge sleepover, lots of ppl came[img]http://www.greenftechn.com/brandon/banner2.bmp[/img]

title: Re: my big birthday party!!
content: Well, that seems definitely a lot more fun than my previous birthday "party" when I turned 18; no gratulations since everyone were long gone to work when I woke up, annoying sunny weather hurting eyes and the room too warm, had to clean my room and [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-garg.gif[/img]  wash my windows. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-offended.gif[/img]  You can guess it was probably my worst one ever. Well, at least got to eat well later that day.[url=http://www.keengrid.net/]keengrid.net[/url]

title: Re: my big birthday party!!
content:
bp, your birthday party sounds like was fun![img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-grin.gif[/img] Mmm... Keen on the cake...[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-drool.gif[/img] I wish I were there![img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-annoyed.gif[/img]:"> Nice to hear it was your birthday.[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-birthday.gif[/img] Signed, Harvey Smith

title: Re: my big birthday party!!
content:
I haven't celebrated my birthday for the last few years. In fact, I doubt anyone besides my grand/parents knows when it is. And I like it that way. I'd rather not be reminded of all the time I've wasted doing nothing. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-oldy.gif[/img]

Anyway, a Keen party sounds like fun. Green Bay party hats... Pin the eyestalk on the Yorp... Maybe I should have one when I'm done feeling sorry for myself.

[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-birthday.gif[/img] --------------

title: Whoa!!!
content:
Your only 10? Wow... and I thought I was the youngest keener at 13. $80, geese. I get 3 dollars an hour for weeding, and stuff. I hate weeding, but it pays the bills (E-costs, soundtracks, ect...)

-- NAJAWA --

title: Re: Whoa!!!
content:
"I hate weeding, but it pays the bills"

Wow, you must have a lot of weeds [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-wink.gif[/img]

title: Weeds...
content:
No; I just don't have that many bills.

BTW - I also mow the lawn, watch my little brothers (you'd call it babysitting without the sitting; they are very active, err... activly destructive, ad patricullarly stupid; "No, we do not drink toilet water *name*"

Just, maybe not that extreme.

-- NAJAWA --

title: Partay!
content:
I wonder why it didn't occur to me to do something like that for my party last weekend... *shrugs* 'Twas amusing nonetheless. Not such a large party as far as 21sts go, but it's probably about the second best I've attented this year. There've been an incredibly dismal array of 21sts taking place.

Maybe I'll do something for Keen's birthday. What's the date for that? December 10th or something, right? Now that I've cleaned the ShedQuarters up there's ample party space, so now we just need excuses to "gather".

[hr]bp i had $79.89 in birthday money
[hr]Heheh. Centrelink (Aussie's welfare system thinggie) gave me a promotion for my birthday. Now instead of ~$214 a fortnight, I'ma be getting ~$404, effective about 13 days from now.

Mum bought me a deep frier a few weeks ago (after months of cooking chips in a frying pan full of oil following the timely death of our previous deep frier), and then on the night of my party I discover my girlfriend had bought me one long before. So that one shall live in the shed while Mum shall keep the one she bought. Then Dad rocked up the other day with a microwave. Glad he wasn't on the same wavelength as Mum and Tess.Cave assectatorem Ductoris Alacris

The development of the hardware, and the greater ability to express every idea that flies into a programmers head, mean that game creators have made the new games congested with every technique in their power. The basic games behind all this are so blurred that people cant catch up. We should go back to basics like Pac-Man and play in an easier, more relaxed way. -Toru Iwatani

[url=http://jimsoft.spatang.com/]JimSoft Lair[/url]

The day is 14th December, in case you mean the day Keen was released first. Edit: Although I first remembered it was 10th too.. But I checked from 3D Realms site and according to that it seems it was 14th.[url=http://www.keengrid.net/]keengrid.net[/url]

"The day is 14th December"

Oooh, so close...my birthday's on the 15th December...although with the timezone difference, December 15 in Australia will be the same time as December 14 in the US...!

title: Anniversary of Existence
content:
While I was in Sydney, I discovered my 21st was the day before the [url=http://www.railcorp.info/150years]NSW train system's 150th[/url].

[hr]KeenRush The day is 14th December
[hr]Excellent. Three days after the December 11 party we celebrate for no apparent reason each year (though we missed it last year). Perhaps I'll organise a DOS LAN.

[hr]KeenRush [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-lol.gif[/img] Spleen, you forgot to end your message
[hr]Actually, I forgot to end the bold tag, and ezBoard did the rest of the forgetting for me.

[hr]KeenRush Be sure to post pics!
[hr]Will do.Cave assectatorem Ductoris Alacris

The development of the hardware, and the greater ability to express every idea that flies into a programmers head, mean that game creators have made the new games congested with every technique in their power. The basic games behind all this are so blurred that people cant catch up. We should go back to basics like Pac-Man and play in an easier, more relaxed way. -Toru Iwatani

title: Bouncy!!!
content:
*Raises Hand*

My birthday is the 29th

My brothers is the 11th

Latyvo's was... Sep 26th.

I want Keen; but my family thinks I'm too obsesed with keen, and most of the kids at my school don't play games, so I think it's going to be a Lord of the Rings party.

-- NAJAWA --
Three for the Elven Kings under the sky
Seven for the Dwarf Lords in their halls of stone
Nine for the Mortal Men doomed to die
One for the Dark Lord on his dark throne
In the lands of Mordor where the shadows lie
One Ring to rule them all
One Ring to bind them
One Ring to bring them all
And in the darkness bind them
In the lands of Mordor where the shadows lie
